definition: a summary of intended expenditures along with proposals for how to meet them, to make a budget
details:
noun
- a summary of intended expenditures along with proposals for how to meet them
= example: a summary of intended expenditures along with proposals for how to meet them
- a sum of money allocated for a particular purpose

verb
- to make a budget
= example: to make a budget
